ModMetaData.name: Awful Survival Meal
ModMetaData.author: k2ymg
ModMetaData.description:
This MOD add a negative mood effect to Pemmican and Packaged Survival Meal, and is *slightly* prevent colonists to eat survival meals. You still need forbid them, provide better meals and keep animals out. But no need always keep eyes on the chef.

Mood effect:
 10 Lavish
 5 Fine
 -4 Nutrient
 -7 Raw
-10 This MOD
-12 Kibble

The duration of this effect is very short.
